alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 28 at 10:19PM MDT until May 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning is now in effect for Sunday from 11 AM until 9 PM for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 222, 224 and 226 through 237...which includes all of the plains, Fremont county below 8000 feet and the San Luis Valley... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for late Monday morning through Monday evening for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather zones 222, 224, and 227 through 237 which includes Fremont county below 8000 feet, the San Luis Valley, southern El Paso county and all of the southeast plains... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 226... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS EXPIRED FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 226... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 226. * Winds...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread. * Lightning...Isolated cloud to ground lightning flashes will be possible tomorrow afternoon over El Paso county.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest
